name: Windows Live Writer Post File
summary: Learn about .WPOST files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WPOST files allow you to write blog posts offline and then publish them when online. They can also be used for transferring posts to another computer and then publishing them.
NOTE: Microsoft Windows Live Writer is discontinued.

description: Web blog post created by Windows Live Writer, a blogging program included with the Windows Live Essentials Pack; saves a blog post entry written by the user and can contain images, videos, and maps as well as the written text.
